DIALOG.TITLE: Reset takes 20 seconds
DIALOG.SUBTITLE: This screen will not close during the reset process
DIALOG.POINT_1: Reset is complete when the second LED stops fast blinking, then turns solid.
DIALOG.POINT_2: Connect your mobile device to the new WiFi network called
DIALOG.POINT_3: Add Winderoo to an existing WiFi network. If the LED starts to slow blink, Winderoo has successfully joined that network.
DIALOG.POINT_4: Wait for your device to reconnect to your existing WiFi network.
